name: Deceased
desc: Person has died since the article was written

name: Equal
desc: Contributed equally to the creation of the document

name: Financial Disclosure
desc: Statement of funding or denial of funds received in support of the research on which an article is based

name: Presented At
desc: Conference, colloquium, or other occasion at which this paper was presented

name: Supplementary Material
desc: Points to or describes supplementary material for the article

name: Supported By
desc: Research upon which an article is based was supported by some entity

name: Ethics Statement
desc: ethical considerations relating to the conduct of the research that a publication is reporting
